subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After four races in the Car of Tomorrow, Dale Earnhardt Jr. joined the list of critics of the new racecar, which is being phased into the Nextel Cup series this season.
snippet: After four races in the Car of Tomorrow, Dale Earnhardt Jr. joined the list of critics of the new racecar, which is being phased into the Nextel Cup series this season.
